name: svelte-school-lunch
description: This is a tutorial project from Fullstack.io.

scripts.build: rm -rf backend/public && npm run frontend:build && cp -a frontend/public backend/public
scripts.purge: rm -rf frontend/node_modules/ frontend/yarn.lock backend/node_modules/ backend/yarn.lock node_modules/ yarn.lock && yarn install-dep
scripts.test: (cd frontend && npm run test) && (cd backend && npm run test)
